name: OnRoot
description:
OnRoot is a game about a little creature called Maggie (Based on the Maga flower), who has the ability to control roots and vines. The main goal is to traverse through the forest level using Maggie's powers. Maggie can summon roots to reach higher places. Maggie can also cast a vine to swing themselves over to other places. Maggie's last ability is the ability to grow out roots from the ceiling to be able to use their vine casting ability on. -

Controls:

Right Click = Aim

Left Click = Use selected ability

MouseWheel = Switch abilities

Creditos: 

Programadores: Jeremy Medina y Angel Arocho (Instagram: @pamchiiis)

Arte:  Juliannette Medina (Instagram: @chalkspider) y  Jaben Carrion(Instagram/Tumblr: @dCjaben)
